EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-08-15-Cloud Migration Demo.ES-2018-08-14-Cloud Migration Business Case
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} Will You Join Us Wednesday?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-demo-webinar/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are invited to join our team of experts, as we demonstrate how to create an accurate and detailed cloud migration plan in minutes this Wednesday, August 15th at 11 am ET.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-demo-webinar/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]>
In this 30-minute presentation <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-demo-webinar/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]>, you will learn how Turbonomic leverages an understanding of your entire estate to identify the best options in AWS or Azure and generates a plan that makes it easy to deliver your unique business case for cloud migration.
See you there!
Regards, Megan
PS - If you can't join the live webinar but would like to learn more, please feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-demo-webinar/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward.
